title: [Silken Mist]
description: A large parchment scrolled in golden ink has the day's activities written upon it and has been placed behind a protective glass frame.  Based on the sheer number of items listed, it looks as if there plenty to keep the passengers busy.  Those fortunate enough to dine at the Captain's Table have also been noted on the poster.
room.location: Silken Mist on Four Winds Isle
